response.overview: Oracles and Revelations - The 21st Century, will it bring the end of the world or a new golden age? Explore prophecies of destruction and renewal from the first Christians to the Atomic Age, from Nostradamus to Native Americans. It offers a sweeping panorama of man's fascination with the millennial myth. Featuring: millennial scholars Hillel Schwartz, Richard Landes, Stephen O'Leary, and more.
response.title: Prophecies: Unravel The Mystery
